original_text: Then Ezra went away from the front of God's temple. He went to the room of Eliashib's son, Jehohanan. While Ezra stayed there, he did not eat any food or drink any water. He was still very sad because the people had not been faithful to God.
korean_text: 이에 에스라가 하나님의 성전 앞에서 일어나 엘리아십의 아들 여호하난의 방으로 들어가니라 그가 들어가서 사로잡혔던 자들의 죄를 근심하여 음식도 먹지 아니하며 물도 마시지 아니하더니

sentences.original_text: from the front of God's temple
He went to the room of Eliashib's son, Jehohanan
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 엘리아십의 아들 여호하난의 방으로 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: he did not eat any food
because the people had not been faithful to God
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 백성들이 하나님께 충실하지 않았기 때문입니다
